title: So Riot, is there something I'm supposed to do with all this Blue Essence?
body:
I have more than enough for the next two champion releases, I already have ~18 rune pages (and I only use one), and I bought Urfwick when the Level Reworked was released.

Is Blue Essence just going to be another number that I watch amass?

replies.body:
Can cap out at 25 pages, and name changes are a way to burn BE, along with champ mastery upgrades.

BE emporium is likely to be back twice a year, and I expect they'll have some new exclusive stuff each time just for people like you who might have piles of excess BE.
It's the same as with Influence Points.
Champion mastery upgrades, otherwise... pretty much.
That feel when you have way too much ADHD to play a single champ for more than 3 games.
me too, but eventually that switching adds up
GIve it to someone else, because YOU are the only one with this problem....according to the boards.
